title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library and simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation saving, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images and compose files for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) usage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app for chatting with local Ollama models, supports DM and channel mentions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete, summarization, and Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example for scaling Ollama inference across multiple GPUs/nodes.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chat interface with OAuth, chat sharing, and plugin-style tools.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and model management; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST wrapper adding JWT auth, rate-limiting, and usage logs atop Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.
